tool_description: Recommends optimal fire suppression system types based on building characteristics, risk assessment, and operational requirements.

risk_category.description: Fire risk category from risk analysis

water_availability.description: Whether adequate water supply is available

environmental_concerns.description: Whether environmental protection is a priority

error_messages: Invalid risk category: Must be one of Light, Ordinary I, Ordinary II, Extra I, or Extra II.
Invalid building type: Building type must be from recognized categories.
Invalid temperature range: Must be normal, freezing, or high-temp.
Water availability must be specified: Indicate true if adequate water supply exists, false otherwise.
usage: Provide the fire risk category, building type, water availability status, and optionally specify temperature range and environmental concerns. The tool will recommend the most suitable suppression system types.

system_limitations.description: Limitations or considerations for the recommended system

selection_rationale.description: Explanation of why this system type was selected
